drupalNodeEvent.title: The 2023 Annual Presentation of the Research Center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University

field_speakers.processed: Research Center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University

field_organizers.processed: Research Center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University

field_description.processed:
The 2023 annual presentation of the Research center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University will release the research results made by the team of DocuSky and international cooperation. The presentation is divided into four panels each containing several sections. The panels include: " Context Discovery Systems of Historical Data", "DocuSky Public Databases", " DocuSky Tool Updates" and "DocuSky New Tools".

(The presentation is given in Chinese)

Date of Presentation：2023/1/5（Thu.）(UTC+8)

10:00-10:40 Part I：Analytical Systems of Historical Data Contexts

10:40-12:00 Part II：DocuSky Public Databases

13:00-13:40 Part III：DocuSky Tools Updates

13:40-15:00 單元IV：DocuSky New Tools
 

Matters needing attention：
1. The online conference adopts Cisco Webex Meetings. After successful registration, the organizer will send the conference link and related information within 3 days before the conference.
2. Please use the chat function for online questions.

 

Registration Steps:
1. Choose the Panels
2. Fill in personal information and send the application form
3. The system will send the link to your email address within three days before the meeting.

Register
